entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:40 a.m. PDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 5.3Â°C
